Html:
Hello

I'm making a polygon editor on the map
In edit mode I want to allow to move some point using the Mousemove event and left mouse button
But for that I need to disable the normal draging mode using the same event and button

It is done automaticaly when the Point is a GmapMarker
How can I programatically disable draging in some condition without using a GmapMarker ?

Thanks for any help

Hello

I solve it by setting the Dragbutton property to none while I need to handle my own move
